name: 辜率品
objective: 本課程主要把城市的發展置於歷史的脈絡中去研究 探討各個歷史階段的城市發展特質 其範圍涉及人類社會的各個領域 從城市的外在形式一直探討到它的內部因素 另外 本課程也探討城市文化與市民生活的品質 並論述城市的建築與空間構成 讓學生瞭解時空轉移中城市發展與需求的差異 並讓學生從城市的歷史發展中找到對付當前城市問題的方法 最後 本課程也會觸及都市重建與現代城市發展的各類議題
schedule:
1 週。都市發展史概述與課程介紹

2 週. The Cities in History-- from Lewis Mumford
歷史中的城市

3 週. The Architecture of the City: 1) The Collective Memory; 2) The Typology; 3) The
Urban Artifacts.
城市建築

4 週. The Urban Transformation: 1) The Decline and Renaissance of the City; 2) The Destruction and Reconstruction of the City; 3) Urban Renewal and Related Issues.
都市的轉型

5 週. The City and Its Boundary: 1) The Customs Boundary; 2) The Nature of City Wall; 3) River Towns; 4) Suburbia and Edge Cities.
城市和邊界

6 週. The Street: 1) The Street and Public Space; 2) The Street Types; 3) The Building Line; 4) The Modernist Street and Its Evolution.
街道

7 週. The Faith and the City: 1) God and the City Center; 2) The Separation of Church and State; 3) The Ideal Center of the City.
信仰和城市

8 週. The City and Cultural Geography: 1) The Symbolic Landscape; 2) The Simulation Landscape; 3) Place or Space; 4) City of Consumption
城市和文化地理

9 週.  The Transformation of the City and the Representation of Film
城市的演變和電影的涵義

10 週. The Public, Public Art and The Build Environment
公共性公共藝術和建築環境

11 週. The Creation of Public Places: 1) The Nature and the Distribution of Public Places; 2) Size and Typologies; 3) The Contemporary Public Place
公共空間的創造

12 週. The European Cities and the Global Tourism
歐洲城市和全球觀光

13 週. The Prague, Venice and Various Popular Destinations
布拉格威尼斯和其他熱門旅遊景點

14 週. Hyper City: 1) City in the Electronic Age; 2) Transparency; 3) Projection; 4) Mutation; 5) Virtual.
超限城市

15 週. parametricism city and new city formation 參數主義的城市和新城市構成

16 週. sustainable city 永續城市

17 週. Taiwan's city formation and development 台灣的城市發展與構成

18 週。學期報告與討論
